reviews.text: I have tried to find rooms in differents hotel but it was full or too expensive. Finally, thanks to internet I have found this place wuth a good value (for 4 persons). The situation is perfect, flat is nice, staff friendly... We were like parisians! I have enjoyed a lot my stay in the flat "Le Notre" and I'm sure, it's the same with my friends. Many thanks!
reviews.title: Thanks! Gracias! Merci! Ajigato! Spassiba! Danke!

reviews.text: Thanks for Helzear to help us so much during our stay! The flat was so nice, it was as the summer flat I dream! I prefer spend my holidays in a flat and not in an Hotel. I will come back...
reviews.title: "Excellent"

reviews.text: A great situation for an honest price. Sometimes I have worked with my partners in the apartment. It's comfortable and design. The Staff was nice and searched to give everything I wanted!
reviews.title: Lovely place

reviews.text: We stayed a couple of nights at Helzear Montorgueuil and found the neighbourhood awesome. Montorgueuil is full is nice restaurants and very alive at night. The apartment we slept in was the Le Notre. It was smallest that it seems on the picture but comfortable though. We appreciated the fact that you can have breakfast and dinner cooked yourself, without having to go to restaurant every night. Staff, even if not on site, are helpful and nice to talk to.
reviews.title: Paris as a Parisian but...
wonderful family trip
reviews.text: One thing that I founded disappointing as I was in Paris for business was the difficulty to book a taxi. When you're in a hotel you simply call reception, but there you have to either call the staff, not always available, or either try to catch one by yourself. And taxis in Paris are not easy to find/ catch. That made my business appointment sometimes hard to reach on time.

reviews.stay_parameters: Stayed March 2013, traveled as a couple
reviews.text: Another point is that cleaning service is not everyday, and you can't have your towels changed whenever you wish.
reviews.title: Very nice experience

reviews.text: But anyway, Helzear is still good value for Paris as you have an apartment for the price of an hotel room.
reviews.title: Excellent option for a family of 4

reviews.text: Me and my family booked an apartment in the Helzear Montparnasse residence. It was a very nice surprise, an oasis of tranquility in the middle of a busy neighbourghood. Easily accesible both by airport and the main attractions, it is a perfect place for a big family with a budget. I would definitely recommend it and I hope to find more places like it for my future vacations.
reviews.title: Do as the romans do...
